creator: andreas@apache.org
text:
I can't update the website. When running

> forrest

the last line is

* [126/105] [0/0]     0.433s 10.9Kb  1_2_x/components/workflow/configuration.pdf

then the process waits forever.

creator: andreas@apache.org
text:
After updating to Forrest 0.7, I get another error:

* [292/0]   [0/0]     0.564s 10.9Kb  1_2_x/tutorial/understanding_lenya.pdf
Logging Error: Writing event to closed stream.
Total time: 5 minutes 57 seconds,  Site size: 4.151.210 Site pages: 261

BUILD FAILED
/Users/nobby/apache/build/apache-forrest-0.7/main/targets/site.xml:41: Java
returned: 1
